column4: COLUMN-Elon Musk just made it easier for shareholders to sue Tesla for fraud: Frankel
column5: NEW YORK  Aug 13 On Monday morning  six days after Tesla CEO Elon Musk tweeted that he was thinking about taking the company private at $420 a share  with “funding secured” for the transaction  Tesla published a blog post in which Musk clarified his tweet.

column4: Major Tesla owner Fidelity trimmed stake last quarter - SEC filing
column5: NEW YORK  Aug 13 Major Tesla Inc shareholder  Fidelity Investments  cut  its stake in the electric automaker by 21 percent during the second quarter  before Chief Executive Elon Musk announced his plan to take the company private earlier this month.

column4: Keeping Tesla shares may not be an option for some big funds
column5: BOSTON  Aug 13 Elon Musk wants to take Tesla Inc private  but some of his big investors may not be able to follow.

column4: Tesla's slow disclosure raises governance  social media concerns
column5: WASHINGTON Tesla Inc’s  handling of Chief Executive Elon Musk's proposal to take the carmaker private and its failure to promptly file a formal disclosure has raised governance concerns and sparked questions about how companies use social media.

column5: Aug 13 Tesla Inc Chief Executive Officer Elon Musk said the Saudi Arabian sovereign wealth fund has expressed support for funding a deal that could take the electric car maker private.
